description: Uploaded by https://gitlab.com/gitlab-com/runbooks/-/jobs/5132059854 at Wed Sep 20 18:47:02 UTC 2023

targets.expr: count(kube_pod_container_info{env=~"$environment", cluster="$cluster", node=~"^$Node.*$", namespace="$namespace", container_id!="", pod=~"^$Deployment.*$"}) by (image)
avg(kube_replicaset_spec_replicas{env=~"$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", replicaset=~"^$Deployment.*"}) by (replicaset)

sum (container_memory_working_set_bytes{env=~"$environment", cluster="$cluster", node=~"^$Node.*$", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"^$Deployment.*$"}) / sum (kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="memory", unit= "byte", env=~"$environment", node=~"^$Node.*$"}) * 100

sum (rate (container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{env=~"$environment", cluster="$cluster", node=~"^$Node.*$", pod=~"^$Deployment.*$"}[2m])) / sum (machine_cpu_cores{env=~"$environment", cluster="$cluster", node=~"^$Node.*$"}) * 100

((sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas{env=~"$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", deployment=~"$Deployment.*"}) or vector(0)) - ((sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas_available{env=~"$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", deployment=~"$Deployment.*"}) or vector(0)))) / (sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas{env=~"$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", deployment=~"$Deployment.*"}) or vector(0))
sum (container_memory_working_set_bytes{env=~"$environment", cluster="$cluster", node=~"^$Node.*$", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"^$Deployment.*$"})
sum (kube_node_status_allocatable{env=~"$environment", cluster="$cluster", resource="memory", unit="byte"})
sum (rate (container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{env=~"$environment", cluster="$cluster", node=~"^$Node.*$", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"^$Deployment.*$"}[1m]))
sum (machine_cpu_cores{env=~"$environment", cluster="$cluster"})
sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas_available{env=~"$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", deployment=~"$Deployment.*"})
sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas{env=~"$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", deployment=~"$Deployment.*"})
sum (rate (container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{env=~"$environment", cluster="$cluster", node=~"^$Node.*$", namespace="$namespace", image!="", pod=~"^$Deployment.*$"}[1m])) by (pod,node)
sum (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{env=~"$environment", cluster="$cluster", node=~"^$Node.*$", namespace="$namespace", resource="cpu", unit="core", pod=~"^$Deployment.*$"}) by (pod,node)

sum(label_replace(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_rate{env=~"$environment"}, "pod", "$1", "pod", "(.*)") * on(namespace,pod) group_left(workload) mixin_pod_workload{env=~"$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload=~"^$Deployment.*"}) by (pod)

sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu", unit="core", env=~"$environment"} * on(namespace,pod) group_left(workload) mixin_pod_workload{env=~"$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload=~"^$Deployment.*"}) by (pod)

sum(label_replace(namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_rate{env=~"$environment"}, "pod", "$1", "pod", "(.*)") * on(pod) group_left(workload) mixin_pod_workload{env=~"$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload=~"^$Deployment.*"}) by (pod) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu", unit="core", env=~"$environment"} * on(pod) group_left(workload) mixin_pod_workload{env=~"$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload=~"^$Deployment.*"}) by (pod)
sum (container_memory_working_set_bytes{env=~"$environment", cluster="$cluster", node=~"^$Node.*$", namespace="$namespace", id!="/",pod=~"^$Deployment.*$", container="nginx-ingress"}) by (pod)

sum(label_replace(container_memory_usage_bytes{env=~"$environment", container!=""}, "pod", "$1", "pod", "(.*)") * on(pod) group_left(workload) mixin_pod_workload{env=~"$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload=~"^$Deployment.*"}) by (pod)

sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", unit="byte", env=~"$environment"} * on(pod) group_left(workload) mixin_pod_workload{env=~"$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload=~"^$Deployment.*"}) by (pod)

sum(label_replace(container_memory_usage_bytes{env=~"$environment", container!=""}, "pod", "$1", "pod", "(.*)") * on(pod) group_left(workload) mixin_pod_workload{env=~"$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload=~"^$Deployment.*"}) by (pod) /sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", unit="byte", env=~"$environment"} * on(pod) group_left(workload) mixin_pod_workload{env=~"$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload=~"^$Deployment.*"}) by (pod)
sum (rate (container_network_receive_bytes_total{env=~"$environment", cluster="$cluster", node=~"^$Node.*$", namespace="$namespace", id!="/",pod=~"^$Deployment.*$"}[1m])) by (pod)
- sum( rate (container_network_transmit_bytes_total{env=~"$environment", cluster="$cluster", node=~"^$Node.*$", namespace="$namespace", id!="/",pod=~"^$Deployment.*$"}[1m])) by (pod)
sum(rate(nginx_ingress_controller_request_duration_seconds_count{env="$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", pod=~"$nginxPods"}[$__rate_interval])) by (status) > 0

panels.title: Requests per second by HTTP status

targets.expr: sum(rate(nginx_ingress_controller_request_duration_seconds_count{env="$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", pod=~"$nginxPods"}[$__rate_interval])) by (host, path) > 0
sum(rate(nginx_ingress_controller_nginx_process_connections_total{env="$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", pod=~"$nginxPods"}[$__rate_interval])) by (state)
sum by (method, host, path) (rate(nginx_ingress_controller_request_duration_seconds_count{env="$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", pod=~"$nginxPods", status =~ "[4-5].*"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Response Error Rate by Method and Path

title: observability: Ingress-nginx
